content.p: Melvin Ling Jia Liang, a year 3 BEng Civil Engineering student shares his experience studying in UNMC and why he has decided to pursue this course. Nuhaa Tegally is in her fourth year studying MSc Civil Engineering. Hear what she has to say about the focus of the masters course, the range of modules on offer and how she hopes to use her degree in the future. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
